__e: As far as I'm concerned, She doesn't have to apologize to anyone for anything.
Pat, I never apologized to anyone for anything as long as I've lived.
I'm sure there's plenty of apologies to go around, but to be honest with you, I'm not interested in who was right or wrong anymore.
As a matter of fact, you don't make no apologies for nobody in your life... including yourself.
I make no apologies for frontier justice, if that's how I'm gonna keep my town in order.
But, no, there's no excuse for what I did.
